channel.title: Recent Talks on 奇安信数据安全研究院

item.title: Minfeng Zhu presenting TVCG Paper “DRGraph: An Efficient Graph Layout Algorithm for Large-scale Graphs by Dimensionality Reduction” at IEEE InfoVis 2020

Yating Wei presenting Evaluating Perceptual Bias During Geometric Scaling of Scatterplots at IEEE VAST 2019

Dongming Han and Jiacheng Pan presenting Structure-Based Suggestive Exploration at IEEE InfoVis 2018
